name: Culver City
shortDescription: A dynamic city known for its entertainment industry roots, trendy dining, and arts scene.
fullDescription: Culver City combines a rich history in film and television production with a modern vibe full of vibrant restaurants, art galleries, and boutique shops. Centrally located in Los Angeles County, it offers a walkable downtown area, beautiful parks, and excellent public transportation. Its diverse community and thriving creative economy make it a sought-after destination for families, professionals, and creatives.
heroImageAlt: Downtown Culver City street with shops and people

neighborhoods.name: West Hollywood

neighborhoods.description: Beach city famous for its pier, shopping, and vibrant lifestyle.

highlights.title: Sony Pictures Studios
highlights.description: Historic film and television studio offering tours and events.

highlights.title: Downtown Culver City
highlights.description: Walkable area with restaurants, shops, theaters, and galleries.

highlights.title: The Culver City Park
highlights.description: Large community park with sports facilities and open green spaces.

highlights.title: Helms Bakery District
highlights.description: Trendy shopping and dining district housed in a historic bakery building.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Shops and restaurants in Helms Bakery District

faqs.question: What is Culver City known for?
faqs.answer: Culver City is known for its entertainment industry history, walkable downtown, and thriving arts scene.

faqs.question: How is the real estate market in Culver City?
faqs.answer: The market features competitive pricing with a range of condos, apartments, and single-family homes.

faqs.question: What are popular things to do in Culver City?
faqs.answer: Explore Sony Pictures Studios, visit downtown shops and theaters, or enjoy outdoor spaces like Culver City Park.

faqs.question: How is commuting from Culver City?
faqs.answer: Culver City is served by multiple Metro lines and offers easy access to major freeways and LAX airport.
